metadata.title: CVE-2021-3542 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2021-42739.Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2021-42739. Notes:All CVE users should reference CVE-2021-42739 instead of this candidate.All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed toprevent accidental usage.
